creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: Black woman at right wearing a dark hat and a light dress and shawl; black girl at center with her hair in two braids, wearing a lace collar; balding black man at left, wearing a suit and tie
markings: To right of title in pencil: [117/250]; below image, between edition and signature, two chopmarks
signed: LRC below image in pencil: [Jackson Lee Nesbitt]; LLC below image in pencil: [\"THE MATTHEW W. JOHNSTON FAMILY\"]
title: The Matthew W. Johnston Family
